Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_rz0qcagi&referenceId=1_rz0qcagi&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: Oil prices start the year with a rally. December Manufacturing PMI and November Construction Spending expected. Travel disrupted by Covid-19 surges and poor weather. Tesla shares rise in pre-market on Q4 deliveries. AT&T and Verizon reject request to delay rollout of 5G.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3FPH7J1
